animeTitle: Tasogare Otome x Amnesia: Taima Otome
animeDescription: Tired of Yuuko's antics for causing more ghost stories to be spread amongst the students, Kirie challenges her to a series of games which if Yuuko loses, she must behave.  (Source: Wikipedia)
